did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Transcripts of taped sessions of a conference on "Women Today" sponsored by the New York State College of Human Ecology (then the College of Home Economics), including transcript of a session on "The Black Woman in America"; memoranda; correspondence; schedules; agenda; and summaries and commentary on sessions.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Transcripts of taped sessions of a conference on "Women Today" sponsored by the New York State College of Human Ecology (then the College of Home Economics), including transcript of a session on "The Black Woman in America"; memoranda; correspondence; schedules; agenda; and summaries and commentary on sessions.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Home Economics.

prefercite.p: See also collection #4-3-1885, box 14, job #69110 for contact sheets of photos taken at the conference and collection #4-3-15, box 82, folder 50 for eleven 8x10 prints taken from the same job

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Intersession Program on Women records, #23-2-1238. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Memos to Participants and Organizers, Meeting Minutes, Agenda Revisions
News Paper Clippings and Press Releases

Panel Discussion: "Is the 'Question of Women' a Political Question?"
Panel Discussion on the Education of Women
Panel Discussion: "Child Bearing, Child Rearing, Abortion, and Contraception"
Panel Discussion: "The Future of Women in America"
Panel Discussion: "The Psychological Difference Between Men and Women"
Panel Discussion: "The Black Woman in America"
